title: I changed to a new computer. When I moved my Thunderbird email accounts, my address books were empty. How do I  retrieve my address books?
content: Please tell me how to get my address books back after moving to a new computer. I have thunderbird, and I've gotten my inbox moved, but my address books are empty. I had hundreds of contacts. How do I get them back. I've tried the import tab but it only wants to import from a file on my computer. As I understand it, my provider keeps data such as this, I just need to know how to access it. My internet provider is Optimum/

title: Supernova is not letting me print emails- asks to save as PDF- also causing printer problems in other programs
content:
I have Supernova 115.2.3 and am having problems with 1) printing an email- it asks me to save as pdf- and does not show printer in drop down 2) is causing other programs to have problems seeing printer that is installed. Why is this happening? This is recent 2-3 weeks. I have to reboot laptop each time I want to print or scan and cannot have TB open when I do. Have HP all-in-one printer/fax/scan. If TB is open, and I try to scan using software for printer, I get asked if I want to install software- which is already installed. I can't work this way. I am used to having Wordperfect, TB open all day and it used to be fine. I could print screen shots, Wordperfect documents, scan and email. Now I am getting these problems.

Please help!
creator: stacymista

title: Tell me which setting is responsible for the delay in receiving mail '''BETWEEN ACCOUNTS'''
content: Hello everyone. I ask for help. I have more than 100 accounts in the client. I have set the "receive emails when the program starts" setting. All accounts are from the same mail server. When the Thunderbird client starts receiving mail from all accounts, an error occurs when receiving mail. This is because there are too many requests per second per mail server. Tell me which setting is responsible for the delay in receiving mail BETWEEN ACCOUNTS? Or "WAIT FOR ONE ACCOUNT TO RECEIVE MAIL, AND START RECEIVING MAIL FROM ANOTHER ACCOUNT." Via about:config. Thank you.
creator: strike1040

title: Emails won't download in Thunderbird
content:
I've been using Thunderbird for all of my email accounts for more than 2 decades. Worked great. However, I have not been able to download any emails except for my gmail accounts since 9/20/23. I've updated to the latest version. When I click on the download nothing happens. It doesn't even try. This is a MAJOR problem since I need computer access to my work email accounts. The only place I can see them is on my iPhone, which is problematic.

What's going on?
creator: kierastroup

title: How can I disable primary password
content: I have spent literally hours trying to fix this with no luck. I am 72 years old and I am not completely incompetent with technology but this issue has haunted me for weeks now. I need someone to walk me step by step over the phone I believe. Please help
creator: gkelly3188

title: Loss of functionality in TB 115
content:
The redesign of TB in 115 has moved the search box into what is traditionally the title bar of a window. Likewise, customization puts buttons, such as "delete", up there as well. This moves them farther away from the message list area.

If one is using a trackpad, this redesign requires much more effort to navigate the screen since the mouse must be moved farther to click the button or to search, and then moved back farther to return to the message list.

I'm sure that someone thought this was cosmetically appealing but it represents a serious degradation in usability.

I strongly suggest that you reconsider the design, putting more emphasis on usability than on cosmetics.

Thank you
creator: essin

title: Thunderbird Version 115.2.3
content: I am using a Mac with Big Sur (macOS Monterey Version 12.7), and my email is POP, using Thunderbird Version 115.2.3. The ""Get Message" option in the left of the menu bar does not work when Thunderbird is first loaded. It only seems to retrieve my messages after I use the "GET NEW MESSAGES" under FILE. It has no point if it does not work. I am thus forced to use "GET NEW MESSAGES" under FILE in order to retrieve my email.
creator: attride

title: Dragon NaturallySpeaking Just Stopped working in Thunderbird
content:
I use Dragon NaturallySpeaking extensively. I've been using it successfully in Thunderbird for years now.

Suddenly today, nothing I dictate in Dragon is being recognized or typed in in Thunderbird. Dragon is working just fine here in my browser, and every place else. So I suspect the issue may not be with Dragon, but instead with Thunderbird. I applied the Universal Computer Fix of rebooting my computer, but that hasn't helped.

Is it possible something in the latest Thunderbird update has broken my ability to use Dragon?

How can I fix this?
creator: BillTreloar

title: Problema apertura file .signed.pdf
content:
Buonasera, quando apro alcuni file .pdf in Thunderbird il file viene aperto dal lettore integrato senza apparenti problemi, però non appena tento di stamparlo viene stampato male, di misure sbagliate e con un'impaginazione che non ha senso (ad esempio tirando dentro le barre zoom di thunderbird stesso).

Ho isolato il caso e ho verificato che questo problema succede solo con file .signed.pdf e file PDF/A, mentre per tutti gli altri la stampa (a parità di impostazioni) è corretta. Se apro i file con adobe funziona tutto. Quando chiudo le anteprime di stampa incriminate inoltre mi segnala "pdf.js - il PDF non è ancora stato caricato per la stampa", questo anche se lascio caricare per ore.

La versione è aggiornata ad oggi ed il problema si verifica anche in modalità risoluzione problemi con add-on giù. Ho modo di risolvere il problema senza dover ripiegare su adobe?
creator: User212923

title: Search for CardBook Add-on
content:
I recently installed CardBook add-on, but it was difficult to find it; Simply typing "CardBook" and CardBook is not included in the search results. If I slightly change the search text by adding a space then just briefly in the previous searches displayed below it is listed there with an icon next to it. I click on that icon CardBook and I can then proceed and install the add-on.

I am using thunderbird 102.x on Windows 10, 7 and a number of Linux Distributions which all behave the same. I think there is a fault in the add-on search feature, although I have not observed the issue with other add-ons.
creator: a.h.lohmann

title: Thunderbird calendar
content: Hi all, I work for a Company in north Italy, and we use Thunderbird, before the update we used Thunderbird version 102 and everything worked fine but now after updating, when a calendar entry is made and you add participants they won't receive an invite but will still see it in the calendar itself. I've looked for some options and found this: " https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/enable-email-invitations-caldav-servers-configured " " https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1309527 " I tried them but the option is still grayed out is there any way to fix it without changing our SMTP server?

Every year in this season Thunderbird ESR(!!!) switches to a new version. Every year the new version is a lot worse of previous. Every year it introduces a lot of cosmetical changes that tha majority of users haven't requested nor approve. You're incompetent developers. You're ignorant men.

title: Can't get new messages after moving profile to another (any) PC
content:
Hi, I've moved TB profiles between PCs so many times and there wasn't any issue until today. I have TB profile on Windows 10 TB 112.5.1 with 4 POP accounts and some subdirectories - nothing fancy - it works just fine. (there is 60GB of data in this profile). If I copy profile to any other PC (win10, win11, tried 3 different PCs) and any TB (112, 115, etc) I can see and open all old emails, but "get messages" not working at all - it won't get new messages at startup or if I click get all or even per account - just nothing happens. No error, no nothing. Sending email works just fine.

I've checked every account - all "get messages" checkboxes are on, tried to delete global messages , no luck.

Any hint what could be wrong?

title: new layout
content: I don't like my new layout - I presume from update. I can't move the line below messages up like I used to so I can't read messages below it. Everything looks too big. How can I get back to the plain old view. I have tried changing views
creator: doreenwanhalla

title: Ve složkách se v pohledu na zprávy nezobrazují posledně doručené zprávy.
content:
V nové verzi Supernova se zprávy nezobrazují po kliknutí na složku ty posledně doručené, ale fokus na zprávy skočí vždycky někam o trochu víš, takže musím rolovat níž na tu posledně doručenou. Když posunu všechny zprávy ze všech složek na posledně doručenou a program ukončím a znova spustím, tak se chyba zase opakuje.

Teď jsem ještě zkoušel klikat a rolovat na poslední zprávu všechny složky od první k poslední a pak to zopakovat bez ukončení programu a jakmile se se vrátím k první složce, tak jsou zase zobrazené zprávy o kus víš.

Nepomohlo ani když jsem klikl v každé složce na poslední doručenou zprávu a nechal si zobrazit její obsah a zpráva zůstala označená. Ani údržba složek.

V předchozí verzi NeSupernova to nědělalo.
creator: JPT_CZ

title: Package the source code into a deb package
content: I have 118 daily versions of the source code now. I want to package the source code into a deb package. What should I do?
creator: shiminfu98

title: modifying account setup
content:
I have a probably uncommon problem. 

       I'm migrating to a new computer. I set up the old accounts (3 of them) on the new computer from scratch.       Then later I wanted to move the old e-mails from inboxes & archives & drafts to the same accounts onto the new computer, and I did this by copying & pasting from old to new. (Old e-mails are important to me to keep track of long term interactions with people & companies.)      The result was I now have duplicates of the 3 accounts on the new installation of TBird. I would like to delete the new versions that I initially created with the installation. I've been observing, and both the new & old versions of the 3 accounts are receiving new e-mails and saving them, so I believe I can delete the new accounts without losing the inboxes & archives that came over from the old computer.      I've been searching the TBird help areas to no avail. But in the process I've realized I should have read them in the beginning. There's plenty of advice there that would have kept me from making this mistake.      Thanks for any help you can give me in resolving this confusing mess.

James Frazier, Marina, CA
creator: jfra2
